ygData.subject: Processor.stop() or Frontier.stop(): run code only on specific CrawlStatus or "normal ending"
ygData.msgSnippet: Hi we ve implemented our own WriterProcessor extending org.archive.modules.Processor. In our WriterProcessor we ve overridden the method stop() to execute some
